scripts.start: TAILWIND_MODE=watch NODE_ENV=development yarn run jekyll & yarn run tailwind
scripts.build: yarn dlx tailwindcss -i ./assets/css/main.css -o ./assets/css/styles.css --minify & bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.production-build: NODE_ENV=production JEKYLL_ENV=production yarn dlx tailwindcss -i ./assets/css/main.css -o ./assets/css/styles.css --minify & bundle exec jekyll build
